body_html:
Ah, could you elaborate on the motivations to build with the monolithic flag?
In this case, I suspect the TF_LoadLibrary call is failing (and returning an error in the TF_Status object). Could you confirm that is the case?
body_text:
Ah, could you elaborate on the motivations to build with the monolithic flag?
In this case, I suspect the TF_LoadLibrary call is failing (and returning an error in the TF_Status object). Could you confirm that is the case?
body:
Ah, could you elaborate on the motivations to build with the monolithic flag?
In this case, I suspect the `TF_LoadLibrary` call is failing (and returning an error in the `TF_Status` object). Could you confirm that is the case?
